subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Chicago has put up more points a game than New Orleans, whose defense, a year after setting an N.F.L. record for yards allowed, has given up fewer than half as many points a game as the Bears.
snippet: Chicago has put up more points a game than New Orleans, whose defense, a year after setting an N.F.L. record for yards allowed, has given up fewer than half as many points a game as the Bears.
